text.div:
Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

CodeURITypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0538 defines the following codes in a Is-A heirarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
EMP EmployeeEmployeeAngestellter
VOL VolunteerVolunteer
CON ContractorContractor
CST ConsultantConsultant

name: InstitutionRelationshipType
title: institutionRelationshipType
description: Code system of concepts specifying the relationship the staff person has with the institution for whom he/she provides services.  Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the STF segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0538 (Institution Relationship Type)

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
